title: 10yr Birthday Gift
body: Thankyou riot for the free gift. Just wondering if someone can shed some light for me please... I got Kayle but dont have the riot skin for her or the special birthday poro icon. Did something go wrong or will this come later? Thanks guys

replies.body: and for those who have kayle and Riot Kayle skin?:D
If you already have Riot Kayle, you get a mystery gift.

I'd imagine it would be awkward to get a skin for a champ you don't own, so I assume that Kayle is being gifted first before Riot Kayle to ensure the gifting process as a whole goes smoothly. If you don't have Riot Kayle by 9/23, as the [announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you) states, let me know.
"The system can only do one thing at a time. So they need to give everyone Kayle first, then give everyone Riot Kayle, then give out the icon, and then move on to the mystery gift stuff."
